Posts.Content: Hi Ann I am 37 and I have just had my 2nd opp to remove cancer cells, i had no clear margin after having 3cm lump removed,I also hade nodes remove for sampling ,they were all clear. I am waiting to find out if i am in the clear if not i will have to have the breast removed i have been told by doctor i have a 20% chance of this happening. If everything is clear then i face hormone, radiation and maybe chemo after everthing has happend so fast  i feel i cant think straight  how did you cope with it all I have 2 children.
Posts.Title: To Chemo or not to chemo - that is the question?

Posts.Content: Hi Ann thanks for replying to me, Im glad you enjoyed a good Christmas meal and that your feeling better. I had good news from results. all cancer has gone... I am now waiting to hear when my chemo will start .....I have been waiting 2 weeks and still havent hered from them more waiting... how long after opp did it take for you to start? keep in touch hope your well Loraine x
